messages.content:
The JLPT N1 exam will be held in Macau on July 6, 2025 [teamlanguages](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHGuK0KpugVdqV9lkp1bb5hCwbAoCCsJJUQdmVaGs5X8oepfoBgy4bJMgIP21hOlRQhilhoYmQRkUGVJ4I7WipBge6xZq_eHVNwX9h5FJFJbVQ5I8uyRBDzlwwr2dgL5zcTBH_ZS1OXjitSerk7nffk2EQxXG_hFys9sXwvXTImmz6Bo79NOfJd_pszKT6G65vZ0It7iq1Olg==) [jlpt](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHk4p7gfaXrH_ElfxwKwhbD4ub7Urpl64Dm18-5WR2T7x4TdQ8mGAi8np966yP8PAIgU9bJWI2thScVcAYiDMDN-WxnaFM6nIQ-U4-57HzeonpA6gJ0Qke8eVBiySY26VKIqlQvy6PHMe7QlHo1HA==) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGYMYUhEh1fAB8sZ6N32nCYoglUtrNZDprUQ6tOb81BGwXyl-ADzBpgaw1l7rfOqtWwayDr7MTis51H29nfRn1C5On1yW1Tvl11_y4G1pU5TmHUJ-19byEQ07cwWu0k31x6tUj_mUM46O5GbQPGnks=) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFCgd66e7sJXGjdEr_qX1EqGHmB5ea2qzR-f9c1OWmypIcxWTg5d-BzyS8xq5Bmv72X4qNZQw5x_2Mf-6aY4QUNHfrSqIT2NOoGIWWPNJ6EpSFimZTkcYDgfp3AbZe1Fexe62R6P5dGIHUEiVCURMJv) [jees-jlpt](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQH74q8ilFS9xiNXrLhgdsj11B-RSVygqbQetAT-FMvPhl1129u-HKAKoC4mLiiJkGrhX0yIY12k9PFrpAF3c3tfBO8_2LcotUTueO6qppf1XigG04POy1eNHwd9DZXplo8cAA==) [jlpt](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFH295nCRFuRc1j1AUAcc4eFUevLfYckDrtClQhkfl2buzYlMgb_EAQl7jw1p7A8Epr7n7N7rqQq8JRLrrBe_GiAuz7mVLxcDQtd53HObB8_Cw=). The N1 and N2 tests are scheduled for the morning, with a report time of 8:15 AM and testing from 8:15 AM to 12:30 PM (for reference only) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGYMYUhEh1fAB8sZ6N32nCYoglUtrNZDprUQ6tOb81BGwXyl-ADzBpgaw1l7rfOqtWwayDr7MTis51H29nfRn1C5On1yW1Tvl11_y4G1pU5TmHUJ-19byEQ07cwWu0k31x6tUj_mUM46O5GbQPGnks=) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHNXzJPKYWs0j11y6Fy7YOvf_5rfRFE7Qnu6QgZCM6hptz6llmnMoPy6IQnX1Dov4fZrbfx1myotHUN4sN8-_-92f9A2z9OelYxPQ9_qVeU2LrZMg0-l0gLLNDrspORfawdpjTOGTjG0tT79KKuCg==) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHa5LSgjISYCS7hnPN7gGNmUM-5p2as5HJWDJfK8XbBjOXDbSP7J-aYR-uq0WcYKjZIt3lGHZCcfsMRMjgcQWvU8T0WeY33gDIYwerAM7aBF-5GfvaSVmUvfasZOPpheTMxag-6VlD1jDrwdX9PKjTiz_I=) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFbklYRJ22haAZtAAq-wD9qtYVKOQRW4h2yxitCt2e1zm-Q4YTHhndIwh3Jk_D744cmX5DtQ109ehfYFHkc_zaFbZReLYPRTqJ1RWioQP1pRYhb-ULy4rCPDFQNhM-wXXZq1aTjCl4TntQdIhBCFoE=) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFCgd66e7sJXGjdEr_qX1EqGHmB5ea2qzR-f9c1OWmypIcxWTg5d-BzyS8xq5Bmv72X4qNZQw5x_2Mf-6aY4QUNHfrSqIT2NOoGIWWPNJ6EpSFimZTkcYDgfp3AbZe1Fexe62R6P5dGIHUEiVCURMJv). The actual schedule will be on the test voucher [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGYMYUhEh1fAB8sZ6N32nCYoglUtrNZDprUQ6tOb81BGwXyl-ADzBpgaw1l7rfOqtWwayDr7MTis51H29nfRn1C5On1yW1Tvl11_y4G1pU5TmHUJ-19byEQ07cwWu0k31x6tUj_mUM46O5GbQPGnks=).

Test locations in Macau are subject to the admission ticket [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQH10acP9ehYf8DSK0EtSgybk_70ZeyXc2pcBAVNKo7hlK_OW6SX1EZBjAFbARnLMK80ILMMVJjx9y1huDJC4WvCys7QHiVR6hMzkZ8Y857Vw2EL66I0A0JO5FY-elT3vS07JSA4Gleik_tmYrTGTPsHYmIE3VOifIHfWLVx2hI=). Possible locations include the Macau Productivity and Technology Transfer Center (CPTTM) Head Office (Rua de Xangai 175, Ed. ACM., 7 andar Macau) and ESCOLA LUSO-CHINESA TÉCNICO-PROFISSIONAL (Rua Primeiro de Maio) [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQH10acP9ehYf8DSK0EtSgybk_70ZeyXc2pcBAVNKo7hlK_OW6SX1EZBjAFbARnLMK80ILMMVJjx9y1huDJC4WvCys7QHiVR6hMzkZ8Y857Vw2EL66I0A0JO5FY-elT3vS07JSA4Gleik_tmYrTGTPsHYmIE3VOifIHfWLVx2hI=). Test centers are assigned through a computer allocation system, and requests to change test centers will not be considered [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHNXzJPKYWs0j11y6Fy7YOvf_5rfRFE7Qnu6QgZCM6hptz6llmnMoPy6IQnX1Dov4fZrbfx1myotHUN4sN8-_-92f9A2z9OelYxPQ9_qVeU2LrZMg0-l0gLLNDrspORfawdpjTOGTjG0tT79KKuCg==) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFbklYRJ22haAZtAAq-wD9qtYVKOQRW4h2yxitCt2e1zm-Q4YTHhndIwh3Jk_D744cmX5DtQ109ehfYFHkc_zaFbZReLYPRTqJ1RWioQP1pRYhb-ULy4rCPDFQNhM-wXXZq1aTjCl4TntQdIhBCFoE=) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHa5LSgjISYCS7hnPN7gGNmUM-5p2as5HJWDJfK8XbBjOXDbSP7J-aYR-uq0WcYKjZIt3lGHZCcfsMRMjgcQWvU8T0WeY33gDIYwerAM7aBF-5GfvaSVmUvfasZOPpheTMxag-6VlD1jDrwdX9PKjTiz_I=).

The organizer for the Hong Kong and Macau region is the Society of Japanese Language Education Hong Kong [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGYMYUhEh1fAB8sZ6N32nCYoglUtrNZDprUQ6tOb81BGwXyl-ADzBpgaw1l7rfOqtWwayDr7MTis51H29nfRn1C5On1yW1Tvl11_y4G1pU5TmHUJ-19byEQ07cwWu0k31x6tUj_mUM46O5GbQPGnks=) [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQH10acP9ehYf8DSK0EtSgybk_70ZeyXc2pcBAVNKo7hlK_OW6SX1EZBjAFbARnLMK80ILMMVJjx9y1huDJC4WvCys7QHiVR6hMzkZ8Y857Vw2EL66I0A0JO5FY-elT3vS07JSA4Gleik_tmYrTGTPsHYmIE3VOifIHfWLVx2hI=) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHNXzJPKYWs0j11y6Fy7YOvf_5rfRFE7Qnu6QgZCM6hptz6llmnMoPy6IQnX1Dov4fZrbfx1myotHUN4sN8-_-92f9A2z9OelYxPQ9_qVeU2LrZMg0-l0gLLNDrspORfawdpjTOGTjG0tT79KKuCg==) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFCgd66e7sJXGjdEr_qX1EqGHmB5ea2qzR-f9c1OWmypIcxWTg5d-BzyS8xq5Bmv72X4qNZQw5x_2Mf-6aY4QUNHfrSqIT2NOoGIWWPNJ6EpSFimZTkcYDgfp3AbZe1Fexe62R6P5dGIHUEiVCURMJv) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFbklYRJ22haAZtAAq-wD9qtYVKOQRW4h2yxitCt2e1zm-Q4YTHhndIwh3Jk_D744cmX5DtQ109ehfYFHkc_zaFbZReLYPRTqJ1RWioQP1pRYhb-ULy4rCPDFQNhM-wXXZq1aTjCl4TntQdIhBCFoE=) [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGs2CJqlnrbFEwDjzFzv_ykN7J97oFS1XXvGXpTcys9qCm7Rmg6ph8l9psPcL_01h74LbUTb1SdIdtFtHdoYWSsBtJ8YIxx4lvaI-khbyNst-PK-JwNG6GXGChEGMkx-brrDggRoAzBTyyai5hfSy8d0qrN2MEOU30glA1-5l6m) [hkeaa](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQG9f41LC7LNQazqW_sinfloSzlWP6HjUfDk7paP2N7DKYevkDgZTnECxZEsPHkijWI3euSBh9b00R17aS79WiiityqK8wWHSKRMpLV4GZSTfeuMgNrTXWGxmDIvsG7h7KdSw0RfTHOgMVBMBKzAlWY1cBxgUrRLz2MEY7mOdzFdWqTfgLn2HpB3tB0z). Online enrollment is required [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGYMYUhEh1fAB8sZ6N32nCYoglUtrNZDprUQ6tOb81BGwXyl-ADzBpgaw1l7rfOqtWwayDr7MTis51H29nfRn1C5On1yW1Tvl11_y4G1pU5TmHUJ-19byEQ07cwWu0k31x6tUj_mUM46O5GbQPGnks=) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFCgd66e7sJXGjdEr_qX1EqGHmB5ea2qzR-f9c1OWmypIcxWTg5d-BzyS8xq5Bmv72X4qNZQw5x_2Mf-6aY4QUNHfrSqIT2NOoGIWWPNJ6EpSFimZTkcYDgfp3AbZe1Fexe62R6P5dGIHUEiVCURMJv) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQHa5LSgjISYCS7hnPN7gGNmUM-5p2as5HJWDJfK8XbBjOXDbSP7J-aYR-uq0WcYKjZIt3lGHZCcfsMRMjgcQWvU8T0WeY33gDIYwerAM7aBF-5GfvaSVmUvfasZOPpheTMxag-6VlD1jDrwdX9PKjTiz_I=). The enrolment period for N1-N5 was from March 18, 2025, to March 24, 2025 [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGYMYUhEh1fAB8sZ6N32nCYoglUtrNZDprUQ6tOb81BGwXyl-ADzBpgaw1l7rfOqtWwayDr7MTis51H29nfRn1C5On1yW1Tvl11_y4G1pU5TmHUJ-19byEQ07cwWu0k31x6tUj_mUM46O5GbQPGnks=) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFCgd66e7sJXGjdEr_qX1EqGHmB5ea2qzR-f9c1OWmypIcxWTg5d-BzyS8xq5Bmv72X4qNZQw5x_2Mf-6aY4QUNHfrSqIT2NOoGIWWPNJ6EpSFimZTkcYDgfp3AbZe1Fexe62R6P5dGIHUEiVCURMJv). Online enrollment could be attempted from March 12, 2025 (00:00 am server time) to March 14, 2025 (23:59 pm server time) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGYMYUhEh1fAB8sZ6N32nCYoglUtrNZDprUQ6tOb81BGwXyl-ADzBpgaw1l7rfOqtWwayDr7MTis51H29nfRn1C5On1yW1Tvl11_y4G1pU5TmHUJ-19byEQ07cwWu0k31x6tUj_mUM46O5GbQPGnks=) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFCgd66e7sJXGjdEr_qX1EqGHmB5ea2qzR-f9c1OWmypIcxWTg5d-BzyS8xq5Bmv72X4qNZQw5x_2Mf-6aY4QUNHfrSqIT2NOoGIWWPNJ6EpSFimZTkcYDgfp3AbZe1Fexe62R6P5dGIHUEiVCURMJv). This enrollment is specifically for candidates who will take the test in Macau and are Macau residents [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGYMYUhEh1fAB8sZ6N32nCYoglUtrNZDprUQ6tOb81BGwXyl-ADzBpgaw1l7rfOqtWwayDr7MTis51H29nfRn1C5On1yW1Tvl11_y4G1pU5TmHUJ-19byEQ07cwWu0k31x6tUj_mUM46O5GbQPGnks=) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFCgd66e7sJXGjdEr_qX1EqGHmB5ea2qzR-f9c1OWmypIcxWTg5d-BzyS8xq5Bmv72X4qNZQw5x_2Mf-6aY4QUNHfrSqIT2NOoGIWWPNJ6EpSFimZTkcYDgfp3AbZe1Fexe62R6P5dGIHUEiVCURMJv). The correspondence address provided must be a Macau address [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGYMYUhEh1fAB8sZ6N32nCYoglUtrNZDprUQ6tOb81BGwXyl-ADzBpgaw1l7rfOqtWwayDr7MTis51H29nfRn1C5On1yW1Tvl11_y4G1pU5TmHUJ-19byEQ07cwWu0k31x6tUj_mUM46O5GbQPGnks=) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFCgd66e7sJXGjdEr_qX1EqGHmB5ea2qzR-f9c1OWmypIcxWTg5d-BzyS8xq5Bmv72X4qNZQw5x_2Mf-6aY4QUNHfrSqIT2NOoGIWWPNJ6EpSFimZTkcYDgfp3AbZe1Fexe62R6P5dGIHUEiVCURMJv]. The online form must be filled out in English [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGYMYUhEh1fAB8sZ6N32nCYoglUtrNZDprUQ6tOb81BGwXyl-ADzBpgaw1l7rfOqtWwayDr7MTis51H29nfRn1C5On1yW1Tvl11_y4G1pU5TmHUJ-19byEQ07cwWu0k31x6tUj_mUM46O5GbQPGnks=).

The test fee is HK$700 [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGYMYUhEh1fAB8sZ6N32nCYoglUtrNZDprUQ6tOb81BGwXyl-ADzBpgaw1l7rfOqtWwayDr7MTis51H29nfRn1C5On1yW1Tvl11_y4G1pU5TmHUJ-19byEQ07cwWu0k31x6tUj_mUM46O5GbQPGnks=) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFCgd66e7sJXGjdEr_qX1EqGHmB5ea2qzR-f9c1OWmypIcxWTg5d-BzyS8xq5Bmv72X4qNZQw5x_2Mf-6aY4QUNHfrSqIT2NOoGIWWPNJ6EpSFimZTkcYDgfp3AbZe1Fexe62R6P5dGIHUEiVCURMJv). Payment can be made at the CPTTM within a specific period [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGYMYUhEh1fAB8sZ6N32nCYoglUtrNZDprUQ6tOb81BGwXyl-ADzBpgaw1l7rfOqtWwayDr7MTis51H29nfRn1C5On1yW1Tvl11_y4G1pU5TmHUJ-19byEQ07cwWu0k31x6tUj_mUM46O5GbQPGnks=). After registering on the Society of Japanese Language Education Hong Kong website, payment of MOP725 can be made through the CPTTM online payment platform upon receiving the “Registration Confirmation (Macau)” email [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQH10acP9ehYf8DSK0EtSgybk_70ZeyXc2pcBAVNKo7hlK_OW6SX1EZBjAFbARnLMK80ILMMVJjx9y1huDJC4WvCys7QHiVR6hMzkZ8Y857Vw2EL66I0A0JO5FY-elT3vS07JSA4Gleik_tmYrTGTPsHYmIE3VOifIHfWLVx2hI=) [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGheyAA311414sw7ftYOWSDOG22zEI3yVyH87zIVninl-g5g5ttSJGSRuhNtJ6sgj4cQqkfU0KFe6k5vLj15DFC0SlTMIMbm2sxWnMWaBGVFPJtqMfCLCVwcaefapQIjuRw7h88KblgxUKh-9cFBAz0B8E5_4O4LEOgFg8=) [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGs2CJqlnrbFEwDjzFzv_ykN7J97oFS1XXvGXpTcys9qCm7Rmg6ph8l9psPcL_01h74LbUTb1SdIdtFtHdoYWSsBtJ8YIxx4lvaI-khbyNst-PK-JwNG6GXGChEGMkx-brrDggRoAzBTyyai5hfSy8d0qrN2MEOU30glA1-5l6m). To pay, access the [Japanese Language Proficiency Test (For Macau Region Payment Only)] page, click [Apply Now], fill in the test level and registration number, and complete the payment [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQH10acP9ehYf8DSK0EtSgybk_70ZeyXc2pcBAVNKo7hlK_OW6SX1EZBjAFbARnLMK80ILMMVJjx9y1huDJC4WvCys7QHiVR6hMzkZ8Y857Vw2EL66I0A0JO5FY-elT3vS07JSA4Gleik_tmYrTGTPsHYmIE3VOifIHfWLVx2hI=) [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGheyAA311414sw7ftYOWSDOG22zEI3yVyH87zIVninl-g5g5ttSJGSRuhNtJ6sgj4cQqkfU0KFe6k5vLj15DFC0SlTMIMbm2sxWnMWaBGVFPJtqMfCLCVwcaefapQIjuRw7h88KblgxUKh-9cFBAz0B8E5_4O4LEOgFg8=). It is recommended to use a computer to log in to the CPTTM platform for payment. For mobile payment, you can choose [Mpay] / [Bank of China Macau Mobile Banking] [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGheyAA311414sw7ftYOWSDOG22zEI3yVyH87zIVninl-g5g5ttSJGSRuhNtJ6sgj4cQqkfU0KFe6k5vLj15DFC0SlTMIMbm2sxWnMWaBGVFPJtqMfCLCVwcaefapQIjuRw7h88KblgxUKh-9cFBAz0B8E5_4O4LEOgFg8=) [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQH10acP9ehYf8DSK0EtSgybk_70ZeyXc2pcBAVNKo7hlK_OW6SX1EZBjAFbARnLMK80ILMMVJjx9y1huDJC4WvCys7QHiVR6hMzkZ8Y857Vw2EL66I0A0JO5FY-elT3vS07JSA4Gleik_tmYrTGTPsHYmIE3VOifIHfWLVx2hI=). Registration will be canceled if payment is overdue [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQH10acP9ehYf8DSK0EtSgybk_70ZeyXc2pcBAVNKo7hlK_OW6SX1EZBjAFbARnLMK80ILMMVJjx9y1huDJC4WvCys7QHiVR6hMzkZ8Y857Vw2EL66I0A0JO5FY-elT3vS07JSA4Gleik_tmYrTGTPsHYmIE3VOifIHfWLVx2hI=) [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGheyAA311414sw7ftYOWSDOG22zEI3yVyH87zIVninl-g5g5ttSJGSRuhNtJ6sgj4cQqkfU0KFe6k5vLj15DFC0SlTMIMbm2sxWnMWaBGVFPJtqMfCLCVwcaefapQIjuRw7h88KblgxUKh-9cFBAz0B8E5_4O4LEOgFg8=) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFCgd66e7sJXGjdEr_qX1EqGHmB5ea2qzR-f9c1OWmypIcxWTg5d-BzyS8xq5Bmv72X4qNZQw5x_2Mf-6aY4QUNHfrSqIT2NOoGIWWPNJ6EpSFimZTkcYDgfp3AbZe1Fexe62R6P5dGIHUEiVCURMJv).

The test voucher and official receipt will be sent by post to candidates in early June [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGYMYUhEh1fAB8sZ6N32nCYoglUtrNZDprUQ6tOb81BGwXyl-ADzBpgaw1l7rfOqtWwayDr7MTis51H29nfRn1C5On1yW1Tvl11_y4G1pU5TmHUJ-19byEQ07cwWu0k31x6tUj_mUM46O5GbQPGnks=) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQFCgd66e7sJXGjdEr_qX1EqGHmB5ea2qzR-f9c1OWmypIcxWTg5d-BzyS8xq5Bmv72X4qNZQw5x_2Mf-6aY4QUNHfrSqIT2NOoGIWWPNJ6EpSFimZTkcYDgfp3AbZe1Fexe62R6P5dGIHUEiVCURMJv). search_query: N1 Japanese Language Proficiency Test (JLPT) test centers Macau 2025
web_research_result:
The Japanese Language Proficiency Test (JLPT) N1 will be held in Macau in 2025 [teamlanguages](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-0) [jlpt](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1). Here's a summary of key information for prospective test-takers:

**Test Date and Time:**

*   The JLPT will be held on July 6, 2025 (Sunday) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2) [teamlanguages](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-0).
*   The N1 and N2 tests will be conducted in the morning, with a report time of 8:15 AM and testing from 8:15 AM to 12:30 PM (for reference only) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-3).
*   Note that the actual schedule will be on the test voucher [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2).

**Test Locations:**

*   Test locations in Macau are subject to the admission ticket [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-4).
*   Possible locations include:
    *   Macau Productivity and Technology Transfer Center (CPTTM) Head Office (Rua de Xangai 175, Ed. ACM., 7 andar Macau) [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-4)
    *   ESCOLA LUSO-CHINESA TÉCNICO-PROFISSIONAL (Rua Primeiro de Maio)
 [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-4)*   Test centers are assigned through a computer allocation system, and requests to change test centers will not be considered. [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-3)

**Registration:**

*   The organizer for the Hong Kong and Macau region is the Society of Japanese Language Education Hong Kong. [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2) [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-4) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-3)
*   Online enrollment is required. [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2)
*   The enrolment period for N1-N5 is March 18, 2025, to March 24, 2025. [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2)
*   Online enrollment can be attempted from March 12, 2025 (00:00 am server time) to March 14, 2025 (23:59 pm server time). [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2)
*   This enrollment is specifically for candidates who will take the test in Macau and are Macau residents. [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2)
*   The correspondence address provided must be a Macau address. [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2)
*   The online form must be filled out in English. [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2)

**Payment:**

*   The test fee is HK$700. [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2)
*   Payment can be made at the CPTTM within a specific period. [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2)
*   After registering on the Society of Japanese Language Education Hong Kong website, payment of MOP725 can be made through the CPTTM online payment platform upon receiving the “Registration Confirmation (Macau)” email.
*   [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-4) [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-5) To pay, access the [Japanese Language Proficiency Test (For Macau Region Payment Only)] page, click [Apply Now], fill in the test level and registration number, and complete the payment.
*   [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-4) [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-5) It is recommended to use a computer to log in to the CPTTM platform for payment. For mobile payment, you can choose [Mpay] / [Bank of China Macau Mobile Banking].
*   [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-5) [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-4) Registration will be canceled if payment is overdue.

** [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2)Test Voucher:**

*   The test voucher and official receipt will be sent by post to candidates in early June.
*   [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2) If not delivered by June 15, contact the organizers.
*   [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2) Candidates must present the test voucher when participating in the test.

** [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2)Important Notes:**

*   Starting in July 2025, mobile phones and other devices with camera and communication functions are not permitted during the test, including breaks. Devices must be turned off until the end of the test. Violation will result in invalidation of the test scores.
*   [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2) Candidates must follow the government's latest epidemic prevention measures and the venue's rules.
*   [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-3) Announcements during the test will be made in Cantonese and supplemented with some Japanese.
*   [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-3) The Society of Japanese Language Education Hong Kong website is the primary source for the latest news.

** [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-4) [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-5)Contact Information:**

*   **Society of Japanese Language Education Hong Kong:**
    *   Tel: (852) 2866-9991
     [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-4) [jlpt](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1)*   Fax: (852) 2866-1331
     [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-4) [jlpt](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1)*   Email: info@japanese-edu.org.hk
*    [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-5)**Macau Productivity and Technology Transfer Center (CPTTM):**
    *   Email: vqa@cpttm.org.mo
     [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-5)*   Tel: (853) 28781313
     [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-5)*   Fax: (853) 2878823

Okay, I will conduct Google Searches to gather the most recent and credible information on the JLPT Macau application process for July 2025 and synthesize it into a verifiable text artifact.

The Japanese-Language Proficiency Test (JLPT) is scheduled for July 6, 2025, in Macau [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0) [jees-jlpt](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1) [jlpt](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-2). The test is organized by the Japan Foundation and Japan Educational Exchanges and Services (JEES) [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-3) [jlpt](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-2) [hkeaa](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4). In Hong Kong and Macau, the test is co-organized by the Society of Japanese Language Education Hong Kong [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5) [cpttm](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-3) [hkeaa](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4).

**Key Dates and Deadlines:**

*   **Enrolment Period:** March 18, 2025 – March 24, 2025.  [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0)Note that one source indicates an enrolment period until April 3, 2025, for Hong Kong, but the Macau-specific enrolment appears to end earlier.
 [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0)*   **Online Enrolment Trial:** A trial period for the online enrolment form was available from March 12, 2025 (00:00 am server time) to March 14, 2025 (23:59 pm server time).
 [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0)*   **Test Date:** July 6, 2025 (Sunday).
 [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0) [jlpt](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-2) [jees-jlpt](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1)*   **Test Voucher Delivery:** Test vouchers and official receipts are scheduled to be sent by post in early June. If not received by June 15, candidates should notify the organizers.
 [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0)*   **Test Voucher Reissue:** You can check your test voucher for reissue on MyJLPT from June 17, 2025. If your test voucher does not arrive until June 20, 2025, or if you have lost it, please print out the test voucher on paper and bring it with you to the test site.
 [jees-jlpt](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1)*   **Result Announcement:** Results for the July test are typically released in late August to early September.
 [japaneselanguagecourses](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-6) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5)
**Eligibility and Requirements:**

*   The enrolment is specifically for candidates sitting the test in Macau and for Macau residents only.  [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0)A Macau address must be used as the correspondence address.
 [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0)*   The JLPT is open to all non-native Japanese speakers, and there is no age limit.
 [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-7)*   Starting from July 2025, the use of mobile phones and other devices with camera and communication functions is not permitted until the end of the test, including during breaks. Devices must be turned off, and turning them on during breaks will be considered misconduct and invalidate the test scores.
 [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-7) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0)*   Candidates must follow the government's latest epidemic prevention measures and the venue's house rules during admission and the test.
 [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0) [japanese-edu](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5)
**Application Process:**
